segments.text: Which type of telephone bill would you like to pay today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My home phone , the landline . I don't have a mobile phone , far too complicated for an old lady like me ! Do you need my Bank Book ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll need your Bank Card , please . Your Bank Book is required for over the counter services ; with the ATM you just need to have your card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's get started . First , select the service you require . That's household bill payment for you . Then we select the type of bill , so that's landline ... here you go . Your bill for this month comes to 87.42 RIB . The money will come out of your account and go straight to the phone company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , that is easy ! It sure beats waiting in line for ages waiting to deal with a real person !
segments.speaker: S1
